title: HPE Annual Profit Forecast Misses Estimate on Margin Crunch
description: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. gave an outlook for profit and cash flow for its upcoming fiscal year that fell short of analysts’ estimates, reflecting a margin crunch in the AI era. The shares fell in extended trading.

title: Cyber Attack Ensnares $4.3 Trillion Muni Market’s Key Site
description: A ransomware attack is disrupting state and local borrowers’ ability to post debt documents on the $4.3 trillion municipal-bond market’s main distribution platform.

title: Walmart on Path to Trillion Dollar Status After OpenAI Pact
description: Walmart Inc. is on track to join the “elite” crop of companies with a trillion-dollar valuation after its announced partnership with OpenAI powered the stock to a record high, according to Mizuho analyst David Bellinger.
